resume_text:
**ANONYMOUS RESUME**

**PROFILE**  
MSc Computer Science student with a Bachelor's in Computer Engineering and Honors in Data Science. Achieved a GPA of 9.72/10 (1:1). Skilled in Python, SQL, Tableau, and PowerBI with hands-on experience in data analysis, visualization, and machine learning. Passionate about using data to drive decision-making and solve real-world problems as an aspiring Data Analyst.

**TECHNICAL SKILLS**  
• Programming Languages: Python, SQL, Java  
• Frameworks: Django, TensorFlow, React.js, Scikit-learn  
• Tools: PowerBI, Excel, Figma, Tableau, Git/GitHub, MS Office  
• Cloud Technologies: Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure, AWS  

**EDUCATION**  
MSc Computer Science (Negotiated Learning): University College Dublin, Ireland (1:1)                          2024 - 2025  
Relevant Courses: Data Science, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, Multi-Agent Systems, Big Data Programming, Advanced Data Structures, Gen AI, Deep Learning, Connectionism and Dynamical Systems, AI & Ethics.  

B.E Computer Engineering with Honors in Data Science (GPA: 9.72/10): University of Mumbai, India             2020 - 2024  
Relevant Courses: Python, Data Structures and Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Big Data Analytics, Natural Language Processing, Statistics for Data Science  

**WORK EXPERIENCE/INTERNSHIPS**  
Machine Learning and Data Science Intern - PHN Technology, Remote                      April 2023 – June 2023  
• Analyzed financial and insurance datasets, performing data cleaning, preprocessing, and feature engineering using Python, SQL, and Excel.  
• Built and deployed machine learning models to detect fraud patterns, identify key attributes, and improve fraud identification.  
• Developed Power BI dashboards to visualize fraud trends and presented insights to stakeholders.  

Full-Stack Developer Intern - Finesse Fashions Pvt. Ltd., India                      June 2022 – August 2022  
• Managed the online store’s clothing inventory and enhanced the visual appeal and user-friendliness of the website by implementing a clean UI using HTML, CSS, PHP, and Laravel framework.  
• Integrated a secure payment gateway to facilitate smooth and encrypted online transactions.  

**ACADEMIC PROJECTS**  
Melanoma Prognosis and Care  
• Developed a Django-based web app in Python for real-time skin lesion classification, detecting cancerous and non-cancerous spots and further categorizing cancer into nine types.  
• Achieved 92% accuracy with a binary classifier and 96% with a multi-class CNN classifier.  
• Presented paper at a conference titled "Image Based Classification of Skin Cancer using Convolution Neural Network," now published in IEEE Xplore (2023).  

Cloud-Based Heart Disease Data Warehousing and Predictive Analysis with AWS S3 and Redshift  
• Analyzed the Cleveland Heart Disease dataset, identifying key risk factors and achieving 84.16% accuracy with Gaussian Naive Bayes.  
• Built a cloud-based data warehouse using AWS S3 and Amazon Redshift with secure IAM access controls.  
• Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard to visualize heart disease trends, patient demographics, and risk factors.  

Green Energy Feasibility Prediction using ML  
• Developed a React application that predicts a region's real-time wind and solar energy output by analyzing real-time climate parameters and past historical data.  
• The application employs multiple ML models (Linear Regression, MLP, and LSTM) to predict solar and wind energy output.  
• Presented paper at a conference titled "Forecasting Renewable Energy Generation: A Predictive Modelling Approach," now published in IEEE Xplore (2024).  

**CERTIFICATIONS**  
• Machine Learning Specialization on Coursera by Stanford University and DeepLearning.AI, August 2023.  
• Natural Language Processing in Tensorflow on Coursera by DeepLearning.AI, October 2023.  
• IBM Data Analysis with Python on Coursera, January 2023.  
• IBM Databases and SQL for Data Science with Python, December 2022.

action_plan.message: Keep pushing forward, every step you take is a step towards your goals!
